text:
SpaceX | Sr. Data Scientist | Los Angeles | On Site http://www.spacex.com/ | Full Time | At SpaceX (Space Exploration Technologies) we're trying to colonize Mars, and do other cool things along the way like create a global satellite constellation for communication/internet and return human spaceflight capability to America.

In this position in particular you'd be working in the Enterprise Information Systems team analyzing data across the business.

There's a lot of companies trying to make the world a better place, but SpaceX is one of the few where you can also make Mars a better place!

I'm an engineer at the company, and not a recruiter, so keep that in mind if you have questions for me.

Also this is a different position than the one I posted in September. SpaceX is expanding its capability for data analysis across groups. There are multiple other positions open for developers and Business Intelligence engineers, if you're interested as well. Check out the careers page.

http://www.spacex.com/careers/position/212724
